item.description:
Join us for movie night at Cinema World on the John Fitch Highway in Fitchburg! We read the book, now let's see how the movie stacks up! If you weren't at book discussion and haven't read the book, read it for this month if you'd like so we can compare the two. If you're not up for it, reading the book is definitely not required! The movie starts at 7:30. Meet us no later than 7:20 inside the front doors of the theater.

If you’d like, also join us for dinner at Bombay Tandoor Grill before the movie! We'll meet there at 6pm for some yummy pre-movie Indian food. They're located just around the corner (about a half a mile) from Cinema World. Their address is below.


Bombay Tandoor Grill

200 Lunenburg St

Fitchburg, MA 01428

 

See you on Thursday!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet right inside the front doors of the theater. Be there at least 10 minutes prior to movie time!
item.name: Movie Night - The Help
